doc.title: Offstacle Course
doc.plot: Darryl Grogan, an office assistant for an insurance company, is called into work on a Saturday, by his boss, a one-time high school football coach, Mr. Franklin Empire. Darryl's been asked to come aboard "the team" but his role is unclear and the task at hand pointless. When Darryl's patience grows thin the radiating light from the copy machine blasts Darryl into another world where the office landscape transforms into his personal playground.
